src:
Manchester City Dapat Kabar Buruk Jelang Berebut Takhta Lawan Liverpool
04 Nov 2019, 17:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Josep Guardiola mengumumkan kabar buruk pasca laga Manchester City vs Southampton. Gelandang David Silva mengalami cedera dan dipastikan absen ketika Man City bertandang ke markas Liverpool.
Man City menang dengan skor 2-1 atas Southampton di pekan ke-11 Premier League, Sabtu (2/11/2019) di Stadion Etihad. Lebih dulu tertinggal, Man City memastikan kemenangan lewat gol Sergio Aguero dan Kyle Walker.
Hasil ini membuat Man City tetap berjarak enam poin dari Liverpool di klasemen Premier League. Liverpool berada di puncak dengan 31 poin dan The Citizen menyusul dengan raihan 25 poin.
Man City punya peluang memperkecil jarak poin tersebut. Man City akan berjumpa Liverpool pada pekan ke-12. Duel ini bakal digelar di Anfield pada Minggu (10/11/2019) pukul 23.30 WIB.
text:
Manchester City Get Bad News Ahead of Liverpool's Throne Against Liverpool
Nov 04 2019, 17:11 by Bola.net
Soccer - Josep Guardiola announces bad news after the match Manchester City vs Southampton. Midfielder David Silva suffered an injury and is certain to be absent when Man City travel to Liverpool headquarters.
Man City won with a score of 2-1 over Southampton in Week 11 of the Premier League on Saturday (11/02/2019) at the Etihad Stadium. First behind, Man City sealed the win with goals from Sergio Aguero and Kyle Walker.
These results make Man City remain within six points of Liverpool in the Premier League standings. Liverpool topped 31 points and The Citizen followed with 25 points.
Man City has the opportunity to reduce the distance of these points. Man City will meet Liverpool in the 12th week. This duel will be held at Anfield on Sunday (11/10/2019) at 23.30 WIB.
